thread.title: Fans demand more screens for Amar Akbar Anthony
thread.title_full: Fans demand more screens for Amar Akbar Anthony - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Fans demand more screens for Amar Akbar Anthony
text:
Nadirshah's Amar Akbar Anthony has been trouncing competition this week, opening to generally favourable reviews.
Fans of the lead trio - Prithviraj, Indrajith and Jayasurya - has been demanding the film be opened to more theatres, especially in other cities such as Chennai and Bengaluru.
Indrajith, who plays Anthony in the movie, too retweeted fans demand on his account in a micro-blogging site. The film is an all-out entertainer that also has Namitha Pramod and Ramesh Pisharody.
